name: Melodic Massacre
description:
------------------------------------------------------------------------

The Game

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Melodic Massacre is a fast passed top down action game where in you play as the guitar player of a popular band who wakes up late on the day of their big concert, so you have to get to the concert no matter the cost.

The main machanic of Melodic Massacre is your attack. You throw your guitar to attack (left mouse button) and when you want to get it back you dash towards it (right mouse button).

Find granades around the levels, they do dubble the damage your guitar does but they are harder to aim so make sure you aim well!

Walk up to a first aid kit to restore all of your health (there is only one in the demo).

 Walk up to a shop to buy upgrades and weapons!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

The HUD

------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. This is your health, When you get hit by a basic enemy you will lose half a heart.

2. These are your weapon cards, they show how many of a certain weapon you have.

3. This shows how many times you have died.

4. This shows how many money you have.

5. This is your minimap, the green square shows your location. The red squares show the location of the enemies.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Move: WASD or Arrows

Attack: Left Mouse Button

Dash To Guitar: Right Mouse Button

Switch Weapon: CTRL

Skip Dialogue: Enter or Space

Reset Level: R
